engine.h1.types.serialize.error_architec: Data is out of bounds. (Architecture size limit exceeded!)

engine.h1.types.serialize.error_fourcc_i: 0x{fourcc:08X} does not correspond to a valid FourCC.
engine.h1.types.serialize.error_max_path: Path exceeds the maximum number of characters and cannot be written to a tag ({size} > {limit}).
